pkgmetadata.longdescription: Mapping of Signalling Networks through Synthetic Genetic Interaction Analysis by RNAi // This package includes all data used in the paper -Mapping of Signalling Networks through Synthetic Genetic Interaction Analysis by RNAi- by Horn, Sandmann, Fischer et al.., Nat. Methods, 2011. The package vignette shows the R code to reproduce all figures in the paper.
